posts.post_title: ALL SOLD or PENDING - 44 T206 cards individually - discounts for large purchases
posts.post_content:
I have the following lower condition T206 cards available individually or with discounts for larger lots:

$75 to $199 total order    -10%
$200 or more total order  -15%

Shipping to USA is $3.00 for either 1 or 2 cards.  3 cards or more shipping is free.  First to commit gets the card(s).
